biography.bio: Winnie Markus was born on May 16, 1921 in Prague, Czechoslovakia as Winifred Maria Eveline Markus. She was an actress, known for Zwei Münchner in Hamburg (1989), Le diable en personne (1956) and Der verzauberte Tag (1944). She was married to Adi Vogel and Heinz Zellermayer. She died on March 8, 2002 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Winnie Markus

biography.bio: Gustav Fröhlich was born on March 21, 1902 in Hannover, Lower Saxony, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Metropolis (1927), Asphalte (1929) and The Sinner (1951). He was married to Maria Hajek and Gitta Alpar. He died on December 22, 1987 in Lugano, Ticino, Switzerland.
biography.name: Gustav Fröhlich

biography.bio: Bengt Lindström was born on January 22, 1924 in Stockholm, Sweden as Bengt Bernhard Lindström. He was an actor, known for A Time to Love and a Time to Die (1958), Vergiß wenn Du kannst (1956) and Hem till byn (1971). He died on October 13, 1977 in Gothenburg, Sweden.
biography.name: Bengt Lindström

biography.bio: Hans Nielsen was born on November 30, 1911 in Hamburg, Germany as Hans Albert Nielsen. He was an actor and assistant director, known for Titanic (1943), Town Without Pity (1961) and Destination Death (1964). He was married to Anna Katharina Elisabeth Novian and Annemarie Giersch. He died on October 11, 1965 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Hans Nielsen

biography.bio: Hanna Rucker was born on December 14, 1923 in Munich, Germany. She was an actress, known for Heart of Stone (1950), Valse dans la nuit (1952) and Ich warte auf dich (1952). She was married to Moses Rothman. She died in 1982 in London, England.
biography.name: Hanna Rucker

biography.bio: Margarete Haagen was born on November 29, 1889 in Nuremberg, Bavaria, Germany. She was an actress, known for Ihr 106. Geburtstag (1958), Sous les ponts (1946) and I accuse (1941). She died on November 19, 1966 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Margarete Haagen

biography.bio: Isolde Stiegler is an actress, known for Heiße Ernte (1956), Der Italiener (1971) and Vergiß wenn Du kannst (1956).
biography.name: Isolde Stiegler

biography.bio: Michael Peter is an actor, known for Vergiß wenn Du kannst (1956).
biography.name: Michael Peter

biography.bio: Edith Schultze-Westrum was born on December 30, 1904 in Wiesbaden, Germany as Edith Käthe Elisabeth Schultze-Westrum. She was an actress, known for The House in Karp Lane (1965), The Bridge (1959) and Das Unbrauchbare an Anna Winters (1963). She was married to Anton Schelkopf. She died on March 20, 1981 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Edith Schultze-Westrum

biography.bio: When we hear songs like "Rambino" and " Ciao Ciao Bambino" the name of Georges Guétary cames to one's mind. But also as a producer of " Bless the bride", "Latin Quartier" in London and "Arms and the girl" on Broadway, he added light and charm to show business. The last show to celebrate 50 years of perfomances was staged at the Robino's in Paris. He returns to ashes in an orthodox church at Cannes where he was cremated.
biography.name: Georges Guétary

biography.bio: Karl Körber was born on September 22, 1941 in Vienna, Austria. He is an actor, known for Vergiß wenn Du kannst (1956). He has been married to Brigitte Ruhland since January 4, 1991. They have one child.
biography.name: Karl Körber
